summary: This early version of my hunters guild adds a new building with four monster hunter followers, this mod requires Coda's Monster Hunter Mod
descriptionHtml:
This is an early version of My Hunters Guild Mod
If you don't like the added tracks just delete the special folder included in this mod


this requires Coda's Monster Hunter Mod



Recommended mods:

My Monster Hunter Music Mod
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91569

recommended to have personalized music for a variety of tracks, or if you want have finale music try the other versions out, although

the other versions only have 3 tracks and is not recommended

Also if you want the monster's from Coda's mod to have boss music check out my other mod

Boss Music For Monster Hunter Monsters
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93142/

Using these two music mod's together really brings the experience to life

I have a lot of plans to expand this mod, all the information I plan so far is included in the read-me packaged with the mod
author: Chaodyn
